text: "Nobody Else" is a 1988 song by New Zealand singers Tex Pistol and Rikki Morris. It went to number 1 in New Zealand and was the follow up the cover version of Wayne Fotana song The Game of Love. At the 1988 New Zealand music awards it was nominated for Single of the Year. == Track listing == 7-inch single :A. "Nobody Else" :B. "Wilf" ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Pop songs
title: Nobody Else (Tex Pistol and Rikki Morris song)
